name: ronsmap
tag_list: car, auto, car-buying, car-selling, online, social-media, google-maps, video, ford, general-motors, toyota, honda, bmw, audi, acura, cadillac, chevrolet, dodge, infiniti, jeep, lexus, lincoln, mazda, mercedes-benz, saturn, volkswagen, volvo, youtube, face
overview:
ronsmap is a game changing online car buying/selling site for both consumers and dealers â€“ making the car buying experience fast, comprehensive, transparent and live.

It is in the combination of maps, social media, and the largest listing of vehicles online that gives the ronsmap community the greatest amount of power when buying and selling a car.

ronsmap.com is owned and created by the leading experts in automotive-retail and social marketing concepts. In March of 2010, we launched what others are calling â€œan elegantly organized solution.â€ It is for youâ€¦ the users, drivers and makers of everything that is the internet.

milestones.description: Via aimgroup.com, "We introduced you recently to Ronsmap.com, saying it would launch soon. The beta site is now available. We took a quick look and found 28 Hyundais in Orlando, Fla. from a variety of auto dealers, 157 Volkswagens at multiple dealerships
